alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 6:29PM EDT until May 03 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lee County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Central Sumter County in central South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 629 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Elliott to 9 miles southeast of Poinsett State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Manning, South Sumter, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Turbeville, Mayesville, Pinewood, Lynchburg, Paxville, Brogdon, Lakewood, Privateer, Gable, Shiloh and East Sumter. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 118 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
